00015 const DEBUG::mem_log DEBUG::check_mem(){
00016     static ProcInfo_t proc;
00017     gSystem->GetProcInfo(&proc);
00018     return mem_log(proc.fMemResident /1024., proc.fMemVirtual /1024.);
